:v-model.description: The value of the currently selected item
:v-model.description_zh: 当前选中项对应的 value

lazy-render.description: Whether the menu content is rendered when it is first expanded
lazy-render.description_zh: 是否在首次展开时才渲染菜单内容

teleport.description: Specifies the node to be mounted, which is equivalent to the [to property](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport) of the Teleport component
teleport.description_zh: 指定挂载的节点，等同于 Teleport 组件的 [to 属性](https://cn.vuejs.org/api/built-in-components.html#teleport)

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggle the menu display status, pass 'true' to display, 'false' to hide, and not to pass parameters to negate
methods.description_zh: 切换菜单展示状态，传 `true` 为显示，`false` 为隐藏，不传参为取反

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when clicking an option causes a value to change
events.description_zh: 点击选项导致 value 变化时触发

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the menu bar is opened

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the menu bar is closed

events.name: opened
events.description: The menu bar opens and triggers when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 打开菜单栏且动画结束后触发

events.name: closed
events.description: Close the menu bar and trigger when the animation ends
events.description_zh: 关闭菜单栏且动画结束后触发
